column4: Hello, resuming after a suspend remounts my root filesystem Read only. This has massive side effects...
is there any fix for it?
(i have a feeling this is why hibernate dosent work, either)

just shut down? I have a similar problem, in that when i suspend, I basically have to restart anyway, so I usually just shut down, and then restart. It's a quick enough restart that I don't really mind. less helpful, I know, but it works
